document.namedEntitiesNotSearched:
Dokument nicht analysiert.

Um Named Entities zu durchsuchen, gehen Sie zu @:menu.analysieren und starten Sie eine neue Aufgabe "@:indexing.findNamedEnties".
document.tiffLimitations: Die Browser-Vorschau dieser TIFF-Datei kann nicht alle Bilder anzeigen. Wir empfehlen Ihnen, die Datei auf Ihren Computer herunterzuladen, um alle Inhalte anzuzeigen.
document.highlightsCaution: Warnung! Die Named Entities werden hervorgehoben und können den Text darunter ersetzen. Dies wirkt sich nicht auf Ihre Suchergebnisse aus.
document.errorNotFound: Ihre Datei wurde in Datashare indexiert, aber das Original befindet sich nicht mehr in Ihrem Datashare-Ordner auf Ihrem Computer. Die Vorschau ist daher nicht verfügbar.

indexing.description: Please read the documentation about adding documents.
indexing.empty: You have not yet started any tasks.
indexing.extractWithOcrLabel: Do you want to extract text also from images and PDFs?
indexing.extractWithOcrHelp: If yes, Datashare will run OCR (Optical Character Recognition). It can take up to 10 times longer.
indexing.extractOnlyNewLabel: Do you want to skip already indexed files?
indexing.extractOnlyNewHelp: If yes, Datashare will only extract text from files that are not yet searchable in Datashare.

indexing.deleteIndexLabel: Remove all your documents from Datashare
indexing.deleteIndexDescription: To be 100% safe, please remove your documents from the Datashare folder on your computer – don't forget to empty your trash bin of all Datashare documents! Make sure you have a copy of them in another secure place beforehand.
indexing.deleteSuccess: Your documents are now removed from Datashare.
indexing.deleteFailure: Something went wrong, unable to remove your documents.

userHistory.heading: Your history
userHistory.description: The last 500 documents you opened with Datashare from this computer.

batchSearch.lead: Search multiple terms and documents at once.
batchSearch.title: Batch searches
batchSearch.heading: New batch search
batchSearch.fileDescription:
Export your spreadsheet as a CSV using encoding UTF-8.
  • Only CSV format accepted.
  • CSV file should not contain more than 60,000 queries.
  • The first and only column should contain the terms to search.
  • No line break(s) in cells.
  • Without 'do phrase match' only, you can use AND OR NOT * ? ! + - and other search operators and use Regex between 2 slashes
batchSearch.success: Your batch search is now running.
batchSearch.error: Something went wrong, unable to start your batch search.
batchSearch.submitSuccess: Your batch search has been added.
batchSearch.submitError: Something went wrong, unable to add your batch search.
batchSearch.submitQueryLimitError: Error in CSV, your CSV exceed 60.000 queries.
batchSearch.name: Name
batchSearch.fuzzinessDescription: Maximum number of operations (insertions, deletions, substitutions and transpositions) on characters needed to make one term match the other.
batchSearch.proximitySearchesDescription: Maximum number of operations (insertions, deletions, substitutions and transpositions) on terms needed to make one phrase match the other.
batchSearch.deleted: The batch search have been deleted.
batchSearch.notDeleted: The batch search has not been deleted.
batchSearch.publishedDescription: Give other members of the project access to this batch search. You can change this later.
batchSearch.phraseMatchDescription: Allows you to search for documents containing an exact sentence or phrase rather than comparing a set of keywords in random order.
batchSearch.phraseMatchDescriptionOperators: Do not insert operators in your queries
batchSearch.author: Author
batchSearch.errorQuery: You have an error on your query %{query}.
batchSearch.errorMessage: The system encountered a problem. It can be a syntax error that you made in your CSV or another error. Please refer to this help page where most common errors are described.

batchSearchResults.title: Batch Search Results
batchSearchResults.deleteAfterRelaunch: Delete current batch search after relaunch

diskUsage.warning: The number of documents only counts parent documents here (files on disk), not attachments (embedded documents).

creationDate.missing: No documents have no or wrong creation date.| 1 document has no or wrong creation date.| %{total} documents have no or wrong creation date.
creationDate.missingTooltip:
There are multiple reasons why a document is not here in the barchart:
    - The document has no creation date at all
    - The creation date of the document is prior to January 1. 1970
    - The creation date of the document is posterior to the current date

duplicates.duplicated: * Duplicated documents are not indexed in Datashare to ease search and avoid creating unnecessary noise.
